website_summaries.verdict: Though a little pricey, the quality is well worth it and great to display on kitchen countertops.
pros: This multipurpose cutting board includes a groove to collect juices and a cracker holder
High quality wood that is eco-friendly, very thick
The board has side handles, well-suited for serving all types of dishes
cons: Check the product when you get it because this company has had issues with packaging

customer_reviews.title: The thickness actually makes for a great visual effect when using as a serving dish
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you open the box you get a sense that this is a high quality product. It has some weight to it so it does not feel flimsy but also light enough to not be a burden to carry with food on top. The thickness actually makes for a great visual effect when using as a serving dish. Overall extremely satisfied with the quality; originally bought it as a gift but have decided to keep this one for myself and buy another haha
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Company made it right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife for christmas, as well as cutting board conditioner. After conditioning it several times, she used it to chop cabbage, and the wood looked horrible after just one use, not to mention it also splintered and a chunk peeled off. That is utterly ridiculous, as we have had incredibly cheap cutting boards for years, and this has never happened. EDIT: 1/25/19 The sellers contacted me, very apologetic that we had this experience, and were gracious enough to explain that it may have just been that particular piece of wood and gave us the opportunity to try out another board, which ended up being great quality and exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable finish, can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows board after a single use of dicing some vegetables. The factory finish seems like it may be a hardening oil of some type of non-penetrating finish instead of a mineral oil/ beeswax conditioning like most good cutting boards. I also suspect the finish may be tinted to make the wood look like something it is not given the contrast of cut marks. Either way I’m disappointed in this board as it doesn’t look or perform as I expected it would.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a turkey
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, versatile but I was looking for something big enough to carve a Thanksgiving turkey on. This would accommodate a small roast or ham but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This feels and looks like high quality craftsmanship. I love this board. It is so beautiful it almost feels like a shame to use it and have it accumulate those knife marks. The grooves are deep and catch everything. the alternate side works perfectly for setting food aside. This is by far my favorite cutting board. Will look to this company for any future quality cutting board needs.
customer_reviews.author: VVu

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maintain!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid of wood cutting board because I felt they were hard to really clean and maintain. This cutting board has become my go-to for several reasons. The cutting board is a stable cutting surface. Any juice simply pools in the slot around all sides. The cutting board is thicker than most I had seen making it easy to use without touching the surface of the counter. It has two sides. It is a lovely surface to serve from. It's so easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy Multipurpose Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cutting board. It is so beautiful and very thick and sturdy. No uneven rocking with this board. Also works wonderful as a meat and cheese board on the other side. Just as advertised crackers or little breads fit perfectly in the cut out spot. As with all darker wood boards the knife cuts do show more than with lighter boards, but treating it with oil does minimize their appearance. It was also a great price! Most cutting boards of this quality cost twice as much. The owners of this small USA owned company are wondeful also.. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Cooking with Art
customer_reviews.text: The Acacia wood chopping block is perfectly finished ... smooth, clean, beautiful. The wood itself is elementally gorgeous. This board's design makes it versatile and keeps messes on the board, not the counter. My only complaint is that I don't want to actually use it ... so beautiful, it should be framed and hung on the wall as art. But use it, I shall. Highly recommend the quality of this chopping block. For years, I have used John Boos boards, which are great. But I am now converted to the Sonder boards: these will be my go to for gift giving!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cutting board, fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: 12/28 - 5/5 Stars! There was an issue with my first board but the owner personally reached out to me and had a replacement product sent out quickly. I am very happy with this experience and will certainly be doing business with this company again in the future as well as recommending this great cutting board to anyone that will listen!! The board looks phenomenal out of the box, has an excellent heft to it, wonderfully placed handles and a deep groove to prevent juices from spilling onto a counter when cutting. Everything with this replacement board is perfect and the customer service to rectify the issue with my first board by the owner herself was outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: This board is a piece of art !!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a cutting board--and it does that too--but first and more to the point, this board is a piece of art. It is downright LOVELY!!! Even the box is wonderful. The quality is evident when actually cutting on the board but trust me I nearly cried when I had to use a blade on my board the first time. Buy this board people and it will be an excellent heirloom to leave to your children.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing art piece! And also a great cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: I acknowledge that I’m in a true love with this art piece! This is not just a cutting board for me and my wife! This is our reason to cut, cook and stay safe at home :) I really admire this family business for their quality and fair price. It wasn’t easy to convince for paying more than $50 for a cutting board as a graduate student whose previous cutting board was a very cheap plastic IKEA! However, I’m so satisfied of my purchase! Beautiful, sturdy, right dimension and excellent thickness, fantastic design and easy to handle for washing. Thanks Sonder, keep going, stay strong!
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL, STURDY, MULTI FUNCTION BOARD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a wedding anniversary gift. I researched and compared many types and brands before deciding on this board. It did not disappoint! This is an absolutely gorgeous cutting board. Besides the beauty; it is a perfect weight without being too heavy to easily lift and turn over to take advantage of the veggie and cheese side with the cracker well. Due to the handy grooves on each side, it lifts to serve on with ease. I will purchase again from this seller. Oh, and the couple I gave it to were thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Knitter Too

customer_reviews.title: A Work of Art!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many cutting boards, but this is the most exquisite one I have ever had. It's absolutely beautiful, and expertly crafted. The quality is outstanding, and love how its reversible. The seller takes special care as it arrives packaged in a lovely box a well. I will be a return customer and would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!!  I Like it!  4-1/2 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Received Board early. After reading instructions, washed gently with S&W. I've used it Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday. I used 8" chef, 10"serrated bread, paring and Japanese santofu knives and they all work great on board. I do like the idea that the board is reversible, perfect size, has grooves to stop "juices" from running everywhere (it worked) and the "easy" to use handles. Will keep it oiled monthly for longer last. Thanks for early delivery!
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got this cutting board back in May, and have been using it almost daily. It's a great-looking board, unique, and very thick/sturdy. I've been oiling it about once/month, but frankly it just repels all the oil, which I take as a sign that it came very well pre-conditioned. On a similar note, the board is exceptionally easy to clean. Food just slides right off it when I run water over. Much better than my other wood boards. Since it's all one piece (no metal handles on the side), it should also be less prone to cracking over time at the handle insertion point (since there is none), unless some of my other boards.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Happiness!
customer_reviews.text: Loving our new cutting board - it just won me brownie points! (Bought it for my wife as a gift for xmas.) It feels super solid because of its thickness and has a great look both in my kitchen and also on the table. Just flip it over for the cutting board on the one side and then the cheese and cracker display on the other. It's got grooves in the sides for your fingers to make it easier to pick up. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: smokingmole

customer_reviews.title: Great size and beautiful wood
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cutting board, the wood is beautiful. The size is great and the deep juice groove is very helpful. The handling goops on the sides are a nice plus. I saw some reviews that there is some marking on the surface when you cut, of course, it is wood! If you don't want the cuts to show, don't cut on it (or use a titanium surface that will scratch anyway. I have found that using mineral oil after each use (as per instruction) is very helpful. Our guests have given it a big thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Danson G. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy board, feels high-end and lovely color.
customer_reviews.text: Great board, sturdy and thick, very well crafted and feels high-end, really liked the color. Only thing is need to remember to maintain it with mineral oil right from the start (just like other wooden boards), so need to remember to purchase those if you don’t have them handy. Overall, love the product. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted and they provide easy instructions on care
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board, we now own two! They tell you how to care for your board, so now water beads off of it. We use them daily. The only negative is that the knife marks show...I have other boards that do not - but we don't like them as well as this so you can see why I rated this board so highly. Recommend buying a cooking grade mineral oil with the board. They will send you an email on how to care for it, and you will already be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is not you average cutting board. It is heavy set and may not be ideal for everyday use unless you have a designated place on your counter for a board this size. And it is not flaky like bamboo made boards. The craftsmanship is impressive. In the end, we opted for an occasional use of the board to preserve its look and instead, bought an Ikea cutting board for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawit

customer_reviews.title: Great dual purpose cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I put this cutting board on my Christmas list and ended up getting two of them. Ha. It's a lovely board, thick, but not super heavy like thick cutting boards typically are. I like that it has a dual purpose. The cutting board side has the juice groove, which always comes in handy...and the other side is perfect for serving things like crackers or olives, with cheese and meat. It's not super large so will fit easily into your cupboards or even a drawer. I highly recommend...plus, you're supporting a small business with your purchase here, and that makes it even better for me! Thanks guys...
customer_reviews.author: M3F

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: You can tell this cutting board was made with pride and care. It is beautiful and sturdy! The company cares about its customers, as stated in their follow up email. They want you to love their product, and I do! I purchased this cutting board at a fair price and would recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: YOUNG GRANDMA

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUTTING BOARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cutting board that is made with excellent workmanship look no further. This is the best board that comes with a warranty. I was able to ask the owner a question about my entry for the warranty. Very prompt response. It is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship and quality cutting and serving board
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship on this board is incredible! I love that I can both cut, prepare, and serve on the same board. The wood is beautiful and sleek. One of my favorite parts is the groove on the side where you can put crackers or nuts. Altogether a lovely board for any chef’s kitchen or host’s cabinet. Will absolutely be buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa mama

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and very sturdy cutting board. I can.’the wait to see my husband open it for Christmas. My favorite feature is the back side that has the space for storing items, like vegetables, after they’ve been cut. The board is very thick and heavy, which will make it perfect to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Chopping on wood never looked better!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of wood work and craftsmanship. I didn’t even want to use this because it was just gorgeous sitting on my counter on its own. The thickness of the block is what I was looking for and the color variations are Jair too lovely for even the picture to capture. My only wish was that it came in even a bigger size than the 17’ one. Arrived quickly and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: BonViViant

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift, but it's mine now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy AGAIN! I purchased a Winsome by Sonder LA cutting board, as a gift for my son, because I was very happy with my Hudson cutting board. When I opened the box, I instantly knew I was going to keep it. Not only is it beautiful, I could envision how much prettier the serving of my food would be for Thanksgiving. The Winsome is stunning and I sure like it's cousin Hudson it will be easy to care for and use. I was happy to be shopping for Christmas early and was ready to check one person off my list. I'm just happy I still have time to order another one for a Christmas present. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian C. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I know what a lot of you are thinking... "Wow, $60 for a cutting board! Seem's steep!" I thought the same thing. However, after reading the countless reviews praising this very cutting board, I decided to take the plunge. I'm sure glad I did! This cutting board is great. Worth every penny. It's stylish, solid, and easy to clean. It makes a statement just sitting on the kitchen counter. I highly, highly recommend this product. PS - The packaging was awesome too! Similar to opening up a brand new MacBook. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: The first cutting board I received did not hold up very well. However, the company did reach out to me and made it their mission to make sure I was happy. They issued me a new cutting board - free of charge! I have only had the new board for a couple of weeks, but I expect it to hold up. Based on other reviews, I must have received a faulty board. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product---Amazing Customer Service--Support this Company!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a minor problem with the natural materials of the wood (a knot popped out after nearly a year) and after contacting Sonder LA they bent over backward to replace the product and ship it to me within days. To be honest I have never encountered better customer service--even after spending many years living in Japan. Sonder is the kind of small company you can feel good about supporting. They are wonderful and the product is amazing as well. Great craftsmanship, presented and shipped in a very classy protective box, with a simple and elegant design. 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: junko masaki

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted boards!
customer_reviews.text: After returning a poorly finished cutting board from another manufacturer, I decided to try a Sonder board and was incredibly happy with the product I received. Happy enough to buy another board (Winsome) for my girlfriend who used it to prepare and present a beautiful fruit and veg board (see picture). Highly recommend their products. Well worth it. Support small business!
customer_reviews.author: b. granada

customer_reviews.title: Great board.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best boards I have purchased, I have 4. I do a lot of cooking so need boards that are workable and easy to clean. Blood grooves are deep and retain an amount of fluid. Has a great cutting surface area and the side handles are perfect for moving board from one location to another. Only slight complaint is due to the dark hard wood, after slicing, cuts show up rather brightly on board. A little Murphy's oil soap and back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Woolweaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of wood! However I will need to return for a replacement since there is a significant crack on the side. This is a Father’s Day gift to my son ! The gift box is very nice! Hopefully the next one I get will not be cracked! The replacement arrived quickly and will make a nice gift. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking board, love the reversibility. However board came warped..Tried on different flat surfaces. Edited Review: As of my last review and video, Tiffany from Sonder LA contacted me and wanted to make things right with my board, and was more than thrilled to send me out a new board, without having me go through the trouble of returning the other one. I received my new board and it's perfect, without warp. I tried again on different flat surfaces and it lays flat. So I updated my review, video, and rating because I was impressed with the board and the customer service shown by Tiffany. Thank you Tiffany and Sonder La for your above and beyond customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Barrington Reid

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: Super nice cutting board. Purchased it for a cheese and meat tray presentation, can't wait to use it over and over again. Love the smooth surface and the drip edges are nice feature. The cracker dip is nice and keeps them in place. Heavy duty board that looks substantial and received lots of compliments. I like that the board is reversible and love the stain color.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally received this as a christmas present and there were some minor areas that were dried around the drip catch area. I contacted Tiffany and they insisted on replacing the item. They were quick to respond and very helpful. The replacement came shortly after. The product is heavy duty, of excellent quality and looks beautiful. The box it comes in is awesome as well with foam padding in it. I highly recommend it due to the build quality and amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Sarbou

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: After my old cutting board warped I went looking for a new one. I finally chose this item based on both the looks and the great reviews. I was expecting something nice but this is outstanding. Believe the reviews - it really is that nice. Attractive, substantial, obviously well made - just a first rate product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: This is worthless. I'm going to buy something else in the future.
customer_reviews.text: This was after using it four times! I am going to keep using it, but if you want a good board, you might need to spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rippon

customer_reviews.title: Small price for such high quality and beauty
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and obviously well built. I've had a number of lower priced and consequently lower quality cutting boards. I recently bought an expensive handmade Japanese Damascus gyuto (chef's knife) and wanted to protect it with a good cutting board. I couldn't be happier with my choice. I've worked in many restaurants in the past and know success depends largely on quality knives and boards. This is just for my kitchen, so I'm all set now. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ray simmons

customer_reviews.title: It's good when people care about the product they sell. Quality is visible.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that is possible to identify when people care about what they do. I was impressed with the presentation and packing of the board. Really happy with the how the board looks and the sturdiness of it. Great finding and purchase. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cutting board! It came in a very nice box and packaging, making it great for a gift. I wish they had an option to imprint a name so I can give it as a gift. The quality is great, very thick material and beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin & Vinicio Avendano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board for cheesy hosts
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about assembling cheeseboards is that there’s nothing to cook :) And this board made me look really good for my first cheesy curation. The handle curves of the board made it super easy to carry, even with heavy goodies on top. It was easy to clean and I can’t wait to use it again. This would be a great housewarming gift, especially for wine-loving/party hosting friends.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship; beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think it would be this hard to find a wooden serving/carving board that is both practical and beautiful. Or so I thought. I searched numerous products and finally found this. Elegant modern eased edging, as opposed to the standard rounding you find in most off-the-shelf products. The price point was also very competitive with similar quality products, if not better. And then the craftsmanship just puts it over the top. This is the perfect gift... I may gift myself another one at some point :)
customer_reviews.author: "singhm2"

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well-made cutting board at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the market for an affordable cutting board that I could use functionally in the kitchen and also as a display piece for entertaining. This totally delivers! My board arrived 2 days after ordering and came in a high end-looking box, which was over and above what I expected. The board looks very sleek and professional (really pretty wood), while totally functional for all of my chopping needs. I can't wait to host guests and use this for my charcuterie boards from now on. It's clear that there's a lot of care put into this business - it shows in the product, the packaging, and the service. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did my homework and this was a great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cutting board. I bought Walrus Oil to condition my cutting board. I use it for chopping salads, making sandwiches on it and everything in-between to cutting meat such as turkey, ham and roasts. I love the craftsmanship. It is very well made. I purchased rubber feet so it would not slide on my tile surface. This is a quality cutting board and I will definitely purchase another one from them when I have a larger kitchen in the future. This one meets my needs for now perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Well made and made in usa
customer_reviews.text: It's a very beautiful wood board. I hated using a knife on it. Delivery was very quick and packaged really nice. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: NJ mom

customer_reviews.title: New favorite cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new cutting board after juggling between some old plastic ones that were due to be tossed after years of wear and tear I not only wanted something aesthetically pleasing but pretty functional and I found just that with the Sonder Los Angeles cutting board. Since it's still pretty new I've been treating it like fine silk and just cutting up fruits and veggies. The compartments that catch the juices sealed the deal for me. Instead of having to chop up food near the sink I can use this on any part of the kitchen without a huge mess! I'm LOVING this purchase so far and definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leaux Samone

customer_reviews.title: Sheds wood into the food
customer_reviews.text: So as I am using this, it has begun to have small shreds of wood come off the top and shed into my food. Really frustrating... all the exterior stain in that region has come off as well. I guess that makes sense but still... Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle and Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous QualIty Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cutting board as a gift to ME!! I absolutely love it! It is a beautiful piece of wood, both sides. Thank you!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Will last a lifetime = Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a wedding gift off of a registry. It looked nice online and as I have had some cutting boards that have lasted years, it seemed a great gift. When it arrived (quickly), I was amazed at how beautiful it was! This is no throw-away-in-a-few-years board. The first thing you notice is the gorgeous grain of the oiled wood. Thick and strong with handles cut out of each end make it easy to move or carry. One side has a large groove around it to catch juices while the other side has a cut out just right to hold crackers. It is beautiful. I just may be a little jealous of the bride to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This board is AWESOME. I used to use plastic ones :D And decided that it was such a hassle that perhaps paying a little bit more for a nice high-quality board would be worth it. And YES. IT TOTALLY IS. I was able to fit so much on this board. Meat juice didn't go all over the counter. Super nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is so perfect and pretty. The perfect choice for the kitchen and entertaining. We received it within a few days!! The cutting board was delivered in a lovely box which made it a great gift as well. Soon after I placed my order one of the owners and designers Tiffany emailed to thank me. I am so happy and proud to support Sonderla and all wonderful small businesses! Thank you,Tiffany.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking! Aside from the finish- the thickness and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking! Aside from the finish- the thickness and and the dual sided function was the attraction for me. It was so good looking and substantial that I've given it a permanent spot on my counter top. Always using it for food prep next to my island sink, and an easy flip makes for a great bread and cheese platter. I looked at a ton of cutting boards, and can really say that there is nothing like it at this price point. Always using the two in one feature! So pleased with it- definitely a statement piece! Great gift for the foodie I. Your life. I ordered 2 and gifted one. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Professional hostess? With this board, YES!
customer_reviews.text: I live to host and making detailed cheese platters is one of my favorite things to do. I order this board recently for the holidays and it’s been my go to for food displays! It makes my food presentation look far better than I deserve. There’s enough space on the board for 4-5 full size cheeses, plenty of crackers, and styled fruits. Love it! I’m even thinking about getting a few for my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Lauver

customer_reviews.title: A cut above
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift so I have not used it as a cutting or serving board. Many types of wood cutting boards are available from discount retailers for half the price of this item. However, this is heirloom quality. Excellent craftsmanship, beautiful finish, rugged and appears to be built to last a lifetime. Reminds me of the cutting board I received as a wedding gift 40 yrs ago that is still used on a regular basis. This is an ideal gift for a special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: JALFPO UNO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile and protective of your knives
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cutting board for everyday use made of acacia wood. It also serves as a carving board with a trough around the edges to catch juices on one side and as a serving board for cheese and charcuterie display with an indentation for crackers on the other side. This is rated very highly as the best cutting board for under $100 and sells for half the price. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B. Borgo

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cutting board. I needed a replacement with a well and it is more than I could have hoped for. It is durable and well-made. I haven't used the reverse side yet, but I am looking forward to using it. Love the versatility and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my ordered cutting board last night. Opened the box and did the quick inspection. Unfortunately found 2-3 cracks. Not sure how the factory controls the quality especially for this kind of expensive cutting board. Very disappoint. Have to return this right way even though the package is pretty beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ChunDong

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this a total of 4 times and it already started peeling and got all scratched up. A total waste of $50 unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Hien Pham

customer_reviews.title: So many scratches after first use
customer_reviews.text: So many scratches after 1st use. What the? Returning it asap
customer_reviews.author: hayeon choi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is beautiful! I am finding it difficult to actually cut on it, but I know I will eventually. I do plan to cut on one side only and keep the other side for displaying and serving. The board was packaged nicely and would make a wonderful gift. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, beautiful, great size!
customer_reviews.text: This board sits on my counter all the time. It is a beautiful board and great size. I do oil it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: That was the fastest shipping I’ve ever experienced on Amazon. Ordered last night, and was at my doorstep before I got home for work the very next day! I’ve been looking around for holidays/ host gifts and stumbled upon the ‘Winsome’ board by Sonder. Very happy with the quality and the durability of the board. It’s beautiful wood grain detail and functional design make this stand out against my other wood boards, therefore, I’ll be keeping this and purchasing another as a gift! Would recommend to anyone in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed_Updated
customer_reviews.text: Original Review: Overall this cutting board seems very nice and made with good quality. However, upon arrival my cutting board had a noticeable missing spot in the finishing coat which I imagine will cause the rest of the board to peel upon usage. Very disappointing. I ordered this as a gift for my father and was unable to give it to him. Update: Tiffany from Sonder reached out to me immediately and took care of the situation. I now have a new cutting board that looks fantastic. You can really tell that Tiffany cares about every customer. Thanks Tiffany. I would buy any of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I entertain a good bit and this board is perfect for our kitchen! The best part is that we can slice cheese and meats on one side and then flip it over and use the side with the groove for crackers to serve! It is very substantial and makes for a beautiful presentation. It’s large enough to serve guests but not so big that it is difficult to clean. Would make a great wedding gift! It comes in a nice box that includes care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Product has great weight, is sturdy and very easy to handle or move around. The indententions on the side make it a perfect tray for appetizers. Cool is beautiful as well as craftsmanship. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RFC

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful I had trouble making the first cut . . .
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is so beautiful I had the most difficult time wanting to actually cut anything on it. Originally I was going to purchase a Boos board but this one came up and I am so glad Sonder came up as an option. I am so happy I denied the urge to go with name brand because this board is wonderfully made and beautiful to look at. I can see myself purchasing these as gifts for Christmas, the box is so nice that it comes in you literally can just wrap it. In addition to the excellent product the customer service is beyond comparison.
customer_reviews.author: alisfinds

customer_reviews.title: Cut marks after first use
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo excited to receive this board! It is absolutely beautiful! I always wanted a nice one that I could use for both chopping and displaying cheeses etc. I ensured to wash it properly and oil it, however, after the first use, the cut marks became very visible. I was able to see the cut marks starting as I was cutting my vegetables. At first I thought that maybe they would fade, but after washing again they became more visible. I would have thought this wood would be more durable. I figured after some time there would be visible wear, but not after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: very good board
customer_reviews.text: i had a few other cheaper boards for IKEA, costco or other cheaper places., costed me 20-30 bucks a few times but they either broken into piece (like the one from costco, glued wood pieces) or bamboo ones that are easy bent. so far I had this board for more than a month, so far so good. it is heavy but stable and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board isn’t your typical cutting board. Not only is it stylish, it is also made with quality. You can use it however you like. I’ve been cooking a lot lately and have been using it when I cut my vegetables. It is also great for cutting steaks (as you can see in the picture below). What I love most about this cutting board is that it is versatile. One side I use as a cutting board and the other side I use to make some pretty impressive cheese boards with cured meats. I am in love with my purchase and would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: J Pahati

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail yesterday, same day shipping was nice! The packaging was super attractive and the wood seems to be of good quality and its two reversible sides are a very nice feature. I have yet to use it but will be sure keep this review updated. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Will P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cutting board. The quality of the wood and the design is beautiful. It came in perfect condition as you can see in my video! Can't wait to put both sides to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best customer service I dealt with!! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good until it started to peel after a month of light use. Update Apparently, the product I received was with a defect. The company went above and beyond to rectify the situation, they were truly amazing, Very happy with the board I have now, it's really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife, she had been wanting a nice cutting board. She initially wanted two boards, one for veggies and one for meats. This reversible board fit the bill, one side scooped out for veggies and the other side for meats! She loves it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: David Savage

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Acadia Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new Cutting Board color so rich,size just right, the handles are useful, the juice grove makes it Perfect ! This board fits beautifully in my kitchen. Thank you Sonder for making this out of Acadia wood which is a very solid wood, in one word “ PERFECT “
customer_reviews.author: Elaine N. Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and I like that you an flip it over to use both sides.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great board but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Easy to care for and cut on (especially with great knife set I got from Amazon). Only problem is that scratches showed up after first use - even though I had applied oil before using. Maybe this is normal??
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rain

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as client gifts. I had their name engraved on it and they are beautiful! So many choices out there but I’m really glad I got these. Definitely ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wow, just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, my new favorite thing. I’m impressed with the beauty (I know, it’s a cutting board), the quality, and the usefulness. A product made in the USA by a small company that, dollar for dollar, blows the competition away.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Wood
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous looking board even the packaging was very impressive. Padded cushions on both sides of the box so no damage could be done to the board. The wood both feels and looks of very high quality. I was most excited to use it as a serving platter with it having its own divet to hold things so I am very impressed with this board just what I was looking for and perfect for all those holiday get-togethers
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn S.

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful cutting board.But So many scratches after first use .The third day It already falling apart! Already return it:(
customer_reviews.author: TzuJung Huang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first high quality cutting board/charcuterie Board. My coworker recommended me this product and I’m glad she did. It arrived well packaged inside a foam protective lining. There were no cracks on mine like some reviews. The quality and finish is exceptional and I would purchase again or give as a gift. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood. Nice solid cutting board. First one I received was a bit warped. Contacted the company and they were quick to respond to make it right. Received a replacement and it was more beautiful than the first. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stephen r.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. Very rich looking, and sturdy, very pleased with this purchase. Item was as described and gift box was nice. I am glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ReinaGirl

customer_reviews.title: A handsome and versatile cutting board
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy without being unwieldy and doubles as a cheese platter on the other side. The design is quite thoughtful in most respects – the juice groove is deep enough to capture most liquid drips that might come from rinsed vegetables. Kudos to the these guys!
customer_reviews.author: Andii Hei

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge problem with my new cutting board...it is so pretty that my wife doesn’t want me to use it! It is everything you promised. It as functional as it is beautiful. I heartily recommend this product to everyone looking for a great cutting board. Great quality craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: DBE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile cutting board! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Never did I ever think that I’d be really excited about a cutting board, but folks, that day has come! This board is beautiful, smartly designed, versatile, and has the perfect weight and dimensions. It looks like it’ll already be a forever piece in my kitchen! I was able to prepare and serve on it this past weekend for my Oscar viewing party, and it was a hit! The cutting board proved to be substantial enough to get all of my chopping done with room to spare, easily cleaned, and a perfect size to really showcase everything that I wanted for my guests to pick through. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cutting board
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful I was reluctant to cut on it. Sturdy. No wiggling. I waited a while to buy a really good cutting board. I'm very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Sue Singer

customer_reviews.title: High quality with unique and useful features
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this beautifully made multi-purpose cutting/cheese/appetizer board. Packaged in its own protective box to store or for gifting purposes. Attractive color and useful design. Care instructions included. Slots in sides act as carrying handles. Love the ability to hold crackers or bread which sets it aside from the majority of cutting boards. You won’t be disappointed in supporting this small company business.
customer_reviews.author: jetflyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cutting Board For the Hostess with the Mostest! :)
customer_reviews.text: So I've been looking to get a board that I can use to prepare one of those beautiful charcuterie boards you see on Instagram and Pinterest. YAY! I found just the perfect one! The Winsome board from Sonder Los Angeles is durable yet chic in design. I love that you can use both sides depending on your needs. It was easy to clean and came with a beautiful gift box if you're thinking about getting this as a gift! Overall, I am super happy with my board and I can't wait to use it when I host people over!
customer_reviews.author: whimsicalfawn

customer_reviews.title: Even more beautiful than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This board is heavy, sturdy & beautiful. Should be the center piece of your table.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Such a beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beautiful reversible board. Super sturdy, such great quality wood and packaged so neatly. It was the perfect size for my breakfast buffet. I absolutely love the added groove. It was perfect for my breakfast berries. Definitely recommend this for yourself and even for friends. It’s the perfect hostess gift!
customer_reviews.author: Zakiya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love the cutting board. It came in packaging that protected it very well. It is even more beautiful than I could tell from the photo on line. I think I will get a lot of use from it because of the dual sides.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaDi

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after less than three months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED my cutting board, but after less than three months, it is already starting to crack. I have oiled it regularly, washed and dried immediately without ever putting it in a drying rack, and have never dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzo

customer_reviews.title: Stand up to carving a wide variety of meats and maintain a look good enough to present food on.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cutting board made of Afrormosia made in Denmark which we purchased in 1961 in the United Kingdom which we used several days per week and dropped several months ago and have been looking for a replacement. This product looks like, if we take care of it, will be passed onto our grandchildren should they have a need for such a products,
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G Maine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cutting board. I never really put much thought into a cutting board or the difference a quality one would make but it definitely names a difference. Yeah, it is a little pricey. But you do get what you pay for. The board is nice and heavy, very sturdy, and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Austin M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had reviewed this product because it cracked after a few weeks. I immediately got a kind response from Tiffany the owner and after much communication and incredibly thoughtful apologies she sent me a new beautiful board and the sweetest card. I cannot tell you how refreshing it is to have this kind of customer service and how much of an impact it can have. Thank you Tiffany for giving us such a positive experience and having such a wonderful and quality crafted product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a beautiful quality wood cutting board then this it! I have purchased many different boards in the past and this one surpassed them all including a $150 board from Williams Sonoma. The owner Tiffany was so helpful and pleasant to work with, which made appreciate this small business even more. Whether you are shopping for yourself or for a gift you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ac

customer_reviews.title: Though was better
customer_reviews.text: It’s very beautiful but scratches really easy when cutting something I though would be harder. First use and it has already a lot of scratches
customer_reviews.author: Clara Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cutting board by far
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a cutting board, and then some. On seeing it, my family was mildly horrified to hear that I intend to cut things on it... it's made of really rich beautiful wood, and oiled very well. The pictures don't quite do it justice. The cracker holder on the flip side is a nice touch; it gives the board a dual purpose that helps save space and reduce clutter. Sturdy, attractive, and useful: can't really ask for much more. Hats off to these folks for designing and producing a top-quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Petersen

product_meta.title: Large Reversible Multipurpose Thick Acacia Wood Cutting Board: 16x12x1.5 Juice Groove & Cracker/Bread Holder (Gift Box Included) by Sonder Los Angeles
feature_bullets: ✔ VERSATILE, MULTIPURPOSE, REVERSIBLE - Designed to be the only board you need. Use the juice groove side for prepping and chopping, and use the recessed channel side for serving and entertaining with a perfectly sized channel to hold your crackers, sliced baguettes, bread and more. Incredible for fresh organic vegetable platters or use as a charcuterie board for cheese and meats to serve with wine.

✔ THICK, DURABLE, CONVENIENT - Our 1.5” thick butcher block style board allows for stability while cutting and the inner handles provide grip for easy carrying and serving. It is built extremely solid for longevity. When cared for correctly, with proper cleaning (hand wash only) and oiling, this board will outlast most items in your kitchen. Applying your preferred oil every 3-4 weeks is essential to ensure that the wood stays hydrated.

✔ DEEP JUICE GROOVES - For catching excess liquid during food prep - no need to worry about juices running off the board and onto your countertop when cooking and cutting up fruits, vegetables, and meats. Perfect for carving grilled brisket, beef, pork, or ribs at barbecues.

✔ SUSTAINABLE ACACIA WOOD - Our acacia wood is Eco Friendly and certified by the Forest Stewardship Council from 100% sustainable plantations, delivering top-quality acacia with minimal impact on the environment. Wood is a natural product, containing natural deviations in its appearance. Trust that your piece will have its own beautiful unique grain and color.

✔ SMALL BUSINESS, BIG SERVICE - We are a small Los Angeles brand and our customers are our #1 priority. We cut no corners in our products and we will cut no corners in our support to you. Purchase with peace-of-mind knowing that we stand behind our products, and in the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will replace your board free of charge within 1-year of your purchase. Warranty registration instructions included.
